channel.title: Home on BlueSnout
channel.description: Recent content in Home on BlueSnout

item.title: Data collection and analytics
item.description: Collecting, processing and storing the data. Visualize it on the dashboard or use it to trigger something bigger.

item.title: Reef Finance
item.description: Reef was at the time a new blockchain, which required a large amount of user facing utilities. We worked on the many parts of the ecosystem: JS SDK python SDK smart contracts hardware Ledger wallet data collection supporting projects and more.

item.title: Rublix
item.description: We designed and maintained a high performance pipeline for collection of different data sources. We implemented APIs for internal and external use.

item.title: Software development
item.description: We develop custom software solutions from simple libraries to full-blown custom desktop, web or mobile applications.

item.title: Rialto AI
item.description: We specialized in creating sophisticated trading algorithms that are designed to thrive in high frequency environments. We worked in the design and implementation of arbitrage and market making ecosystems, which includes data collection and transformation from a wide variety of sources. With our expertise in implementing models that can act upon this data, we’re able to provide our clients with powerful and effective trading solutions that deliver results."

From the initial idea phase to the finished product, we work closely with our clients to ensure that their vision is brought to life in a timely and cost-effective manner.

item.title: AI & Machine Learning
item.description: State-of-the-art algorithms to gain insights from complex data. Who needs human intelligence anyway?

item.title: Consulting
item.description: Not sure how to approach the problem? We can give you a hand.

item.title: Blockchain & FinTech
item.description: Smart contracts, custom Polkadot blockchain, Ledger hardware applications, surrounding libraries. We got you covered.

item.title: Automation & Optimization
item.description: If you spend a lot of time repeating the same task, we can provide a system to automate it out of your life.
